name: Perpboost
description: What is the project about? Perpboost is world's first aggregator and P2P perpetual protocol, powered by LSDs, launching on Base Mainnet. What makes your project unique? We can offer the lowest borrow fees for perpetuals because of our P2P matching engine. At the same time, we aggregate liquidity across chains via various perpetual protocols like GMX, GNS, etc. History of your project. We started building the protocol about 5 months ago, We are a DeFi native team. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We will be launching our V1 testnet in next 4-6 weeks and mainnet 2 weeks after that. What can your token be used for? Governance(as we will be transitioning to the DAO soon), Staking, Rewards.
